page.title: 10FAMILY LIFE - WEST INDIAN
page.content:
In four weeks I am going to Barbados. I have a granny there. It has taken us a year to save the money. I am looking forward to going there and seeing my granny. I wish my granny lived nearer.
She lives in a big wooden house in the country-side. I hope she is well. My mum's sister is going too, and my four sisters as well. It's our once in a lifetime chance to see her. We are all very happy. I am also happy because that is where my mum comes from. My dad comes from St.Andrews nearby.
By Peter Small(Newtown Primary School)
